versions.title: Annual personal wellbeing estimates
versions.summary: Estimates of life satisfaction, feeling that the things done in life are worthwhile, happiness and anxiety for adults aged 16 years and over, UK, 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
versions.description: This dataset shows the average rating of those that feel satisfied about their lives (where 0 is 'not at all satisfied' and 10 is 'completely satisfied'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The statistical geography of the observation being measured.

columns.name: areanm
columns.description: The statistical geography of the observation being measured.

columns.name: geography
columns.description: The categorisation of the geography code

columns.name: observation
columns.titles: Estimates of life satisfaction, about happiness and anxiety for adults aged 16 years and over, UK, 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
columns.description: Observation value of adults aged 16 years and over about happiness and anxiety in the UK, 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type asscoiated with the observation value.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit of measure of observation value.

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound.

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound.

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value, if needed.
